name: Next Giant Game
description:
Next Giant Game is a game where you control a giant character in a small colourful world. It's a spiritual successor of my previous game: It's a Giant.

Right now, the game is very basic, unfinished even, and there's no story. For now it's just an open world game.

Other than that, it features:

  • A simple dialogue system. You can talk with characters and inspect all things on the map.
  • Almost fully destructible environment. Use the stomp to destroy objects.
  • Ability to change the size of the character, which influences his speed, hitbox and what you can destroy.

Controls:

WSAD/Arrow keys
Movement
Z
Lie on ground

XCrouch
R
Reset scale

MMap
Left Shift while moving
Faster Movement

SpaceStomp Attack

Left Click on Object/NPC
Interaction

In future, I plan to improve this game, by adding new features, new game modes and build an acutal story-driven game.
